labels.analysis: The MCP Server provides tools to access, search, and analyze personal lifelog data recorded by Limitless AI, which captures daily conversations and activities. The primary functionality revolves around retrieving and querying personal data stored in the lifelog system. This enables users to enhance productivity, decision-making, and content creation by leveraging AI-assisted insights from their recorded activities. The tools focus on personal data management and interaction, with a strong emphasis on retrieval and search capabilities.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Memory Management" is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around storing, retrieving, and analyzing personal lifelog data, similar to a knowledge base or note-taking system. "Content Creation" is added as a secondary label because the insights derived from the lifelog can aid in generating content. The predefined categories adequately cover the server's functionality, so no custom label is needed.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Limitless AI Lifelog Access
server_info_crawled.author: @Hint-Services/mcp-limitless
server_info_crawled.overview: Enable AI assistants to seamlessly access and analyze your personal lifelog data recorded by Limitless AI. Retrieve, search, and understand your daily conversations and activities to enhance productivity, decision-making, and content creation. Integrate your lifelog with AI for context-aware assistance and intelligent insights.

tools.name: getLifelogs
tools.description: Deploy Server Limitless AI Lifelog Access @Hint-Services/mcp-limitless Try in Playground getLifelogs

tools.name: getLifelogEntry
tools.description: Retrieve a specific lifelog entry by its ID. Get detailed information about a particular recorded moment from your Limitless AI pendant.

tools.name: searchLifelogs
tools.description: Search through your lifelog entries from Limitless AI. Find specific conversations, topics, or moments by searching through the content and summaries of your recorded activities.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@Hint-Services/mcp-limitless/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: limitlessApiKey
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: Your Limitless AI API key (get from https://www.limitless.ai/developers)
